name: Chili con Queso with Chicken (Similar to Carlos O'Kelly's)
author: Patty2007
summary: I fell in love with Carlos O'Kelly's chili con queso with chicken, and experimented until I came up with something I think is a great imitation.  It's often a requested appetizer dip at family functions. Serve hot with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped onion, or to taste
⅔ (1 pound) package processed cheese, cubed
2 small cooked skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, shredded
½ (4 ounce) can green chiles, chopped - or to taste
directions: Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat, and cook and stir the tomato, onion, and garlic until the tomato has released its juice and the juice has become thick and syrupy, about 10 minutes
Mix in the processed cheese cubes, and stir until melted and smooth
Stir in the sour cream, shredded chicken, green chiles, salsa, seasoned salt, and oregano until thoroughly mixed, and cook until hot but not simmering, about 5 minutes, stirring constantly
